description:
• Senior Living Area Business Development Director* - West of Boston, MA

LeaderStat is partnering with a rapidly growing senior living provider who is seeking an Area Business Development Director (outside sales position) for the Greater Boston market, supporting communities in Watertown, MA and Chestnut Hill, MA. This is a much needed position in this area due to company growth and an excellent marketing infrastructure.

The company and its properties put a premium on hospitality and service. The staff are focused, passionate, and caring.

Qualifications:
• 3+ years experience selling a service (Senior Living, Hospice, Home Health, Hospitality)
• External field sales experience is required (road warrior)
• Good tenure throughout career
• Strategic thinker, entrepreneurial spirit, creative mind-set
• Experience with writing business plans and setting goals

The Business Development Director will enjoy:
• Base salary + monthly bonus plan + full benefits package
• Rapidly growing company with extensive resources and amazing marketing infrastructure
• Company is truly dedicated to hospitality and service
• Excellent corporate sales support
